statements: SELECT * FROM geolocation_data;
SELECT user_id, latitude, longitude FROM geolocation_data WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geolocation_data ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, location_name FROM geolocation_data WHERE location_name LIKE 'New%';
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM geolocation_data WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT * FROM geolocation_data WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
SELECT user_id, location_name FROM geolocation_data WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -70
SELECT * FROM geolocation_data ORDER BY location_name DESC, longitude ASC
SELECT user_id, latitude, longitude, location_name FROM geolocation_data WHERE location_name LIKE '%Park%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM geolocation_data
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE target_location = 'POINT(1.23 4.56)';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, location FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, username, email, location FROM users WHERE location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE location.STDistance(geometry::Point(10, 20, 4326)) < 1000;
SELECT * FROM users u JOIN campaigns c ON u.location.STIntersects(c.target_location);
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, latitude, longitude FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, location_id FROM targeting WHERE user_id = 2 OR location_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, latitude, longitude FROM users WHERE latitude > 40.0;
SELECT user_id, username, location_name FROM users JOIN targeting ON users.user_id = targeting.user_id JOIN locations ON targeting.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT DISTINCT location_name FROM locations WHERE latitude < 30.0 ORDER BY location_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, location_id, COUNT(*) FROM targeting GROUP BY user_id, location_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, geopoint FROM target_locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT user_id, location_id, preference_score FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_score >= 3.0;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email, created_at FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%John%';
SELECT location_name, geopoint FROM target_locations WHERE marketing_campaign_id = 3 ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, tp.preference_score FROM users u JOIN user_preferences tp ON u.user_id = tp.user_id WHERE tp.preference_score > 3.5;
SELECT * FROM user_locations;
SELECT user_id, user_name, latitude, longitude FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM location_events ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT region_name, ST_AsText(region_boundary) FROM target_regions WHERE ST_Contains(region_boundary, POINT(0,0));
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_budget, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_budget > 1000;
SELECT * FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, latitude, longitude FROM user_locations WHERE latitude > 40 ORDER BY longitude DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_time FROM location_events WHERE event_time > '2022-01-01' AND event_location LIKE '%Plaza%';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY campaign_budget DESC;
SELECT user_id, notification_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE preferred_region_id IS NOT NULL AND notification_preference = TRUE ORDER BY user_id ASC;
